note.p: Daughter of James Edwards, bookseller, of Pall Mall, London, and his wife Catherine Bromhead. Stepdaughter of Thomas Butt, curate of Trentham, Staffordshire. Married Frederick Carne Rasch (1808–76), lawyer, in 1842.

p.ref: Alum. Cantab., s.v. Rasch, Frederick Carne
